instructions.es: En la rotonda gira a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: En la rotonda gira a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Au rond-point, tourner à gauche en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Di bundaran, belok kiri menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Alla rotonda svolta a sinistra verso Destination 1
instructions.nl: Ga links op de rotonde richting Destination 1
instructions.pl: Na rondzie skręć w lewo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Na rotatória vire à esquerda sentido Destination 1
instructions.ro: La sensul giratoriu virați stânga spre Destination 1
instructions.tr: Göbekli kavşakta Destination 1 istikametinde sola dön
